links.*: Map of Beleriand and the Lands to the North

wikitext.*:
'''Cape Balar''' was the small cape that lay to the south-west of [[Arvernien]], and marked the northern limit of the [[Bay of Balar]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>

On [[The Second 'Silmarillion' Map]], a later addition by Tolkien shows the place name "Ship-havens" on the small bay formed to the east of Cape Balar<ref>{{WJ|11}}, p.190, and map case [K5] p.184</ref>.
